hero.headline: Turn Your Goals Into Reality
hero.subheadline: Tell DOER your goal, and watch it transform into a structured plan complete with checkpoints, tasks, and a personalized timeline.
hero.placeholder: e.g., Learn to play guitar, Start a blog, Get in shape...
hero.inputSuggestions: Not sure where to start? Try one of these:
hero.suggestion1: Learn how to cook Tikka Masala
hero.suggestion2: Create a study plan for my AP Physics exam this Friday
hero.suggestion4: Start a blog and publish weekly articles

tabs.step1Title: Describe your goal or specific challenge.
tabs.step1Description: Tell DOER what you want to achieve, and we'll transform it into a structured plan with checkpoints, tasks, and a personalized timeline.
tabs.step2Title: Preview and refine your AI-generated plan.
tabs.step2Description: Review your personalized plan, adjust checkpoints, and customize your plan to match your preferences.
tabs.step3Title: Launch your customized plan and track your progress.
tabs.step3Description: Activate your plan, monitor progress in real-time, and work together with others to accomplish your goals.

features.title: Getting started with DOER
features.description: Transform your goals into actionable plans with AI-powered planning, progress tracking, and seamless integrations.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect DOER with your favorite tools and services to streamline your planning and goal achievement.
integrations.subtitle: Each connector keeps the AI scheduler aware of your calendars, tasks, and energy so every update is reflected instantly.

cards.appleCalendar: DOER reads every Apple Calendar commitment so the AI scheduler can tuck its plan around existing life blocks, while sending AI-generated events back to keep the calendar canonical.
cards.outlook: Outlook meetings flow into DOER so the scheduler carves focused work sprints before each call and pushes any AI-rescheduled slots right back into your inbox-driven agenda.
cards.googleCalendar: Google Calendar is kept in lockstep with the AI planner—DOER mirrors checkpoints as events, keeps shared links updated, and leans on the calendar feed when juggling availability across teams.
cards.todoist: DOER drafts tasks into Todoist complete with priorities and due dates, and when Auto-Scheduling reshuffles a session the list is updated so checklists reflect the latest AI thinking.
cards.asana: Map AI plan checkpoints into Asana projects so DOER can align its auto-scheduler with project timelines and let collaborators see which AI-scheduled task unlocks the next sprint.
cards.trello: Every task DOER generates becomes a Trello card with the estimated effort and scheduled day attached, keeping the Kanban board honest while the planner reorders work as priorities shift.
cards.notion: Notion pages become the single source of truth for plan context—DOER uses embedded notes as prompts for new task generations and references them whenever it re-optimizes the AI schedule.
cards.slack: Slack delivers rich plan digests, lets you ask DOER for a quick auto-reschedule via slash commands, and broadcasts notifications whenever the AI scheduler shifts a checkpoint.
cards.strava: Strava workouts inform DOER about recovery windows; the AI scheduler keeps high-intensity fitness days from colliding with heavy cognitive work and celebrates completion with a plan update.

comparison.title: Why DOER?
comparison.description: See how DOER transforms goal planning beyond basic calendar management

testimonials.title: What people are saying
testimonials.description: Real feedback from users who are achieving their goals with DOER

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about DOER
faq.q1: How does DOER generate my plan?
faq.a1: DOER uses advanced AI to analyze your goal, break it down into actionable tasks, estimate timelines, and create a personalized roadmap. The AI considers complexity, dependencies, and realistic scheduling to give you an achievable plan.
faq.q2: Can I modify the AI-generated plan?
faq.a2: Absolutely! While DOER creates an intelligent starting point, you have full control to customize tasks, adjust timelines, and adapt the plan to your specific needs and preferences.
faq.a3: DOER currently integrates with Google Calendar, Outlook, and Apple Calendar. Additional integrations for task management, communication, and knowledge tools are coming soon.
faq.q4: Is there a free plan available?
faq.a4: Yes! DOER offers a free plan with all core features including AI plan generation, task management, basic integrations, and daily automation. Perfect for personal use and getting started with goal achievement.
faq.q5: How does the smart scheduling work?
faq.a5: Our AI-powered scheduler analyzes your available time, task priorities, and dependencies to automatically place tasks in your calendar. It considers your work hours, existing commitments, and optimal productivity patterns.
faq.a6: DOER is currently focused on individual goal achievement. Team collaboration features are planned for future releases.

pricing.title: Flexible pricing for every goal
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your journey and upgrade whenever you're ready.
pricing.getAccessTo: Everything you need to get started:

cta.headline: So, what are we doing?
cta.subheadline: Are you a talker? Or are you a

footer.description: DOER is the AI-powered platform that transforms your goals into structured, actionable plans. Using natural language, DOER enables anyone to turn their ambitions into personalized plans with checkpoints, tasks, and smart scheduling.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect DOER with your favorite tools and services to streamline your planning and goal achievement.
integrations.subtitle: Each connector keeps the AI scheduler aware of your calendars, tasks, and energy so every update is reflected instantly.

cards.appleCalendar: DOER reads every Apple Calendar commitment so the AI scheduler can tuck its plan around existing life blocks, while sending AI-generated events back to keep the calendar canonical.
cards.outlook: Outlook meetings flow into DOER so the scheduler carves focused work sprints before each call and pushes any AI-rescheduled slots right back into your inbox-driven agenda.
cards.googleCalendar: Google Calendar is kept in lockstep with the AI planner—DOER mirrors checkpoints as events, keeps shared links updated, and leans on the calendar feed when juggling availability across teams.
cards.todoist: DOER drafts tasks into Todoist complete with priorities and due dates, and when Auto-Scheduling reshuffles a session the list is updated so checklists reflect the latest AI thinking.
cards.asana: Map AI plan checkpoints into Asana projects so DOER can align its auto-scheduler with project timelines and let collaborators see which AI-scheduled task unlocks the next sprint.
cards.trello: Every task DOER generates becomes a Trello card with the estimated effort and scheduled day attached, keeping the Kanban board honest while the planner reorders work as priorities shift.
cards.notion: Notion pages become the single source of truth for plan context—DOER uses embedded notes as prompts for new task generations and references them whenever it re-optimizes the AI schedule.
cards.slack: Slack delivers rich plan digests, lets you ask DOER for a quick auto-reschedule via slash commands, and broadcasts notifications whenever the AI scheduler shifts a checkpoint.
cards.strava: Strava workouts inform DOER about recovery windows; the AI scheduler keeps high-intensity fitness days from colliding with heavy cognitive work and celebrates completion with a plan update.
cards.linear: Linear issues become DOER tasks with priorities and due dates; when the AI scheduler reshuffles work, Linear boards update to reflect the latest timeline and keep engineering teams in sync.
cards.clickUp: ClickUp tasks sync with DOER plans—the AI scheduler creates tasks with estimates and deadlines, and when priorities shift the workspace reflects the updated schedule automatically.
cards.mondayCom: Monday.com boards receive DOER tasks as items with timelines; the AI scheduler keeps project views current as work gets rescheduled and ensures dependencies stay aligned across teams.
cards.jira: Jira issues sync with DOER tasks—the AI scheduler creates tickets with story points and due dates, and when plans change the backlog updates to match the latest sprint timeline.
cards.discord: Discord channels receive DOER plan updates and milestone notifications; the AI scheduler posts summaries when tasks are rescheduled and keeps communities informed about progress changes.
cards.obsidian: Obsidian vaults store plan context as notes—DOER references linked thoughts when generating tasks and updates knowledge graphs whenever the AI schedule evolves.
cards.evernote: Evernote notebooks become the knowledge base for DOER plans; the AI scheduler uses embedded notes as context for task generation and keeps plan details synchronized across all devices.
cards.oneNote: OneNote pages store plan details and reference materials—DOER uses notebook content when creating tasks and updates sections as the AI schedule adapts to new priorities.
cards.github: GitHub issues sync with DOER tasks—the AI scheduler creates issues with labels and milestones, and when development plans shift the repository timeline updates to match the latest schedule.
cards.appleHealth: Apple Health data informs DOER about activity levels and recovery needs; the AI scheduler avoids scheduling intense work after high-activity days and adapts plans based on fitness patterns.
cards.googleFit: Google Fit workouts influence DOER scheduling—the AI scheduler accounts for exercise intensity and recovery windows, ensuring cognitive work doesn't conflict with fitness goals.

features.title: Features
features.description: Discover all the features that help you transform your goals into reality.
features.moreComingDescription: New capabilities ship every week so you can plan, execute, and adapt without friction. Join now to unlock the full DOER toolkit.

aiPlan.title: AI Plan Generator
aiPlan.description: Turn any goal or initiative into an actionable plan in seconds. DOER analyzes intent, breaks work into checkpoints, and estimates the effort required so teams can hit the ground running.
aiPlan.videoPrompt: Embed Loom walkthrough: typing a goal and reviewing the generated plan.

smartScheduling.title: Smart Scheduling & Reshuffling
smartScheduling.description: Keep every task in the right place without babysitting the calendar. DOER proactively schedules, resolves conflicts, and reassigns work as priorities shift.
smartScheduling.videoPrompt: Embed Loom walkthrough: viewing the calendar, resolving a conflict, and auto-rescheduling.

automations.title: Automations & Integrations
automations.description: Connect DOER to the tools your team already relies on. Trigger automations from progress updates, and keep stakeholders aligned without manual follow-up.
automations.videoPrompt: Embed Loom walkthrough: configuring an automation and watching it fire in Slack.

analytics.title: Progress Analytics & Health
analytics.description: Understand the health of every plan at a glance. DOER surfaces trends, risks, and wins so leaders can respond before deadlines slip.
analytics.videoPrompt: Embed Loom walkthrough: navigating dashboards, spotting risks, and sharing a recap.
